scripts.say: Kaga, this jade brooch is for you. Wear it, and it shall keep you safe.
Actually, I also have another one for Akagi. The one I'm giving you is pair- I mean, a spare.
(Amagi, why are you giving me something like this all of a sudden... ? Don't tell me...)
What's with that conflicted expression? I just picked it up while passing by a flea market. Don't think too hard about it~
(Having that said, isn't this the first time Amagi has given me something?) I-I'll be sure to treasure it.
Yes, I'd appreciate it if you wore it at all times~
(The era of aircraft carriers, huh... It's just as you said, Amagi.)
(I have been hard at work protecting Akagi, who is now serving as an aircraft carrier. Just like you asked me to...)
(Back then, who would have thought that bootlicker would become one of the leaders of the Sakura Fleet...)
(From time to time, I can almost see your face when I look at her...)
(... but it's probably just an illusion, caused by my own immaturity.)
(Rest assured though. Now, she is like a true sister to me, bound by blood.)
(Although the situation with the Sirens... has perhaps escalated beyond what you could have imagined.)
(Amagi, if you were here, what would you do...?)
Hehehe, it looks like a little mouse has snuck into our "Sanctuary"... Tester, have you located them yet?
Wide-range monitoring... this is something I have quite a bit of experience with, ahaha!
Fifth Carrier Division, you foolish children... You do not know anything yet...
Let me test your abilities with this weapon that transcends the Gods!
